pluggable.name: Featured Image
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Adds a featured image and summary field to the publish form.

help.value:
Adds a featured image and summary field to the publish form.

The following will be made available to your theme:

  • $post->featuredimage
  • $post->featuredimage__width (you don't need height for responsive layouts)
  • $post->summary
